title: Carl Perkins - The Best  [V0](Big Papi) Italy Import Rock &
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Source: DNR 504 CD + Cover Art Scan
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Blue Suede Shoes was written and recorded by Carl Perkins in 1955. Carl, Elvis and Johnny Cash used to tour the United States together. Later, Elvis made Blue Suede Shoes one of his most famous songs and one the most famous rock and roll song ever recorded.

This particular compilation CD sounds so clean for being from the 50's that it must have been remastered by the Italians but it does not state that on the CD tin canister. It sounds so clear Big Papi almost ripped it as FLAC.

- Big Papi
